alert.note: Alert for Glasscock; Midland (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:50PM CDT until June 02 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GLASSCOCK AND NORTHEASTERN MIDLAND COUNTIES... At 649 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greenwood, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public reports quarter sized hail in Greenwood at 6:48 PM CDT. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Midland, Greenwood and Spraberry. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 142 and 146. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for western Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
